The book identifies three key flattening forces that generate plateaus, two principles to guide readers in engineering a plateauÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s destruction, and three actions to take to achieve peak behavior. It helps us to stop wasting time on things that are no longer of value and to focus on the things that leverage our time and energy in spectacular ways.

 Anything you want to do betterÃ¢â‚¬â€play guitar, make friends, communicate with your children, run a businessÃ¢â‚¬â€you can accomplish faster by understanding the plateau effect.
